Guilherme Del Fiol

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3959010040147335
  • Última atualização do currículo em 23/05/2013

Dr. Guilherme Del Fiol earned his PhD in Biomedical Informatics from the University of Utah. He earned his MD at the University of Sao Paulo, Brazil and his MS in Computer Science at Catholic University of Parana, Brazil. He is an Assistant Professor in the University of Utah s Department of Biomedical Informatics; his expertise is in clinical decision support, knowledge management, controlled terminologies, and health-care IT standards. His experience and research includes five years as a Medical Informaticist at Intermountain Healthcare on the Clinical Knowledge Management Team (2002-2006), where he developed a web service called Infobutton Manager, allowing the integration of knowledge resources into Electronic Health Record systems. He also helped build a corporate-wide clinical knowledge management infrastructure. At Duke University, Dr. Del Fiol was an Assistant Professor in the Department of Community and Family Medicine (2008-2011), where he worked on several grant-funded clinical decision support projects using web services, most notably OpenInfobutton (an open-source knowledge integration web service). He joined the Biomedical Informatics Department in 2011 as an Assistant Professor; he is co-chair of the Clinical Decision Support Work Group at Health Level 7 International, leading the development of clinical decision support standards, such as the Context-Aware Knowledge Retrieval (Infobutton) Standard. (Texto informado pelo autor)
